title: Yours Forever
description: For fans of J Lynn, Jodi Ellen Malpas and Sylvia Day comes the final book in the Reign trilogy. This is an all-consuming, raw and powerful love story that seduces, suprises and stays with you.Playing at forever is a dangerous game…Torn between two men and surrounded by secrets, Lana is forced to make an agonising choice. But what – and who – does she really want?
author: Joya Ryan
